channel.title: Comments on: Upcoming Events
channel.description: Strategies to recover from stress quickly

item.title: By: Jerry Sheridan
item.dc:creator: Jerry Sheridan
item.description:
At this point we are focusing on this blog and a book we are writing on resilience. We still do workshops, but, for now we are just doing them in response to invitations.
We are located in Kansas City, Missouri.
Jerry Sheridan
item.content:encoded:
At this point we are focusing on this blog and a book we are writing on resilience. We still do workshops, but, for now we are just doing them in response to invitations.

We are located in Kansas City, Missouri.

Jerry Sheridan

item.title: By: Stephanie Russell
item.dc:creator: Stephanie Russell
item.description: Hello, Are you still providing resiliency trainings, and if so what is your location and cost of the training. Thank you for your time and help in advance, Stephanie Russell
item.content:encoded:
Hello,
Are you still providing resiliency trainings, and if so what is your location and cost of the training.
Thank you for your time and help in advance,
Stephanie Russell
